name: Torture's Creation
description:
Welcome to Torture's Creation, where you are a Voodoo Doll that has to dodge falling pins!  I'm Sebby, and this is my very first game that I made. It's not really great, but it's mine!

I used a Udemy course for this game, the link is here: https://www.udemy.com/course/make-your-first-2d-game-with-unity-c-beginner-cours...
